Name: Dragon Ninja Clan Sword Of Destiny Game
About the game: ABOUT THIS GAME ____________________________________________________________________ Plan the perfect attract move using creative problem solving, Martial arts moves, Dragon Ninja Clan Sword Of Destiny Game features a fully intensifying and interactive Action game in a City Environment, this is multi player’s platform using up to (4) players where you will have the freedom and emergent gameplay are the driving mechanics. Dragon Ninja Clan Sword Of Destiny Game Characters has explosive Martial Arts action. There is no short cuts to fighting evil doers in the (Rock-Town City), you will be Fighting Robot Ninja’s also (3) Boss fights to take back the City, You will be climbing building structures jumping from building to building, you will be able to eliminate the bad guys and pick up D-coins where you can use them to buy Special moves, speed, health, Stamina etc. The Goal is to take back the (Rock Town City) by picking up as many D-Coins as you can to buy special moves in the game to be able to beat the White Fang gang of Villains that took over (Rock-Town City).
